post_title: T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait Sgc 4
post_content:
***CARD IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE***

T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait - Sgc 4

Pictures tell the story. Just a wonderful looking card that presents much better than the assigned grade.

Buy here on the b/s/t and avoid the auction house taxes and dreaded buyers premium you'd have to add ;)

If you'd like to discuss the card please drop me a PM or email.

Thanks all,

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
